text: SECONDARY INDEXES Approach #1: Logical Pointers —> Use a fixed identifier per tuple that does not change. —> Requires an extra indirection layer. — Primary Key vs. Tuple Id Approach #2: Physical Pointers — Use the physical address to the version chain head { ; } }I -‘D 1:03:24 / 1:09:33 - Background Vacuumin > - [ce] * Œl_D E] CMU Database Systems - 19 Multi-Version Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
